revised_title: Researches on the Minute Structure of the Thyroid Gland
tldr: The authors examine the minute structure of the thyroid gland in various animals, including the dog, cat, horse, rabbit, and more. They observe the gland's vesicles, epithelium, contents, parenchyma, lymphatics, blood vessels, and undeveloped portions, providing detailed descriptions and conclusions about each aspect of the gland's structure and function.
